text: Hello! I'm Sparsh Mishra, a passionate Computer Science and Mathematics student at the University of Wisconsin-Madison. My academic journey has placed me on the Dean's List from 2023-2025, reflecting my deep commitment to technical excellence.

Professionally, I've had the opportunity to dive into cutting-edge technologiesâ€”from managing complex ML experimentation lifecycles with MLFlow and Hydra at Dirac Labs to developing high-performance real-time inference pipelines on NVIDIA Jetson Orin Nano.

I'm a builder at heart, focusing on architecting robust, scalable, and efficient systems, whether I'm optimizing system latency by 30% using AWS OpenSearch or developing custom RAG pipelines with AWS Bedrock.
I'm fluent in a range of languages including Python, Java, and C++, and I thrive on leveraging my diverse skill set to transform challenging ideas into concrete, functional solutions.
